trans-unit.source: Represents a managed OracleBFile object designed to work with the Oracle <xref uid="langword_csharp_BFILE" name="BFILE" href=""></xref> data type.
trans-unit.target: Representerer et administrert OracleBFile-objekt som er utviklet for Oracle <xref uid="langword_csharp_BFILE" name="BFILE" href=""> </xref> datatype.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: The Oracle `BFILE` data type is an Oracle `LOB` data type that contains a reference to binary data with a maximum size of 4 gigabytes.
trans-unit.target: Oracle `BFILE` datatypen er en Oracle `LOB` datatype som inneholder en referanse til binære data med en maksimal størrelse på 4 GB.

trans-unit.source: An Oracle `BFILE` differs from other Oracle `LOB` data types in that its data is stored in a physical file in the operating system instead of on the server.
trans-unit.target: En Oracle `BFILE` er forskjellig fra andre Oracle `LOB` datatypene at dataene lagres i en fysisk fil i operativsystemet i stedet for på serveren.

trans-unit.source: Note that the `BFILE` data type provides read-only access to data.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at den `BFILE` datatypen gir skrivebeskyttet tilgang til data.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, write-oriented methods inherited from the <xref:System.IO.Stream> class are not supported.
trans-unit.target: Derfor skrive orientert metoder arvet fra den <xref:System.IO.Stream>klassen støttes ikke.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Other characteristics of a `BFILE` data type that distinguish it from a `LOB` data type are that it: - Contains unstructured data.
trans-unit.target: Andre egenskaper for en `BFILE` datatype som skille den fra en `LOB` datatypen er at den:-inneholder ustrukturerte data.

trans-unit.source: - Supports server-side chunking.
trans-unit.target: -Støtter serversiden dele opp.

trans-unit.source: - Uses reference copy semantics.
trans-unit.target: -Bruker referanse copy semantikk.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you perform a copy operation on a `BFILE`, only the `BFILE` locator (which is a reference to the file) is copied.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du utfører en kopieringen på for eksempel en `BFILE`, bare den `BFILE` overført locator (som en referanse til filen).

trans-unit.source: The data in the file is not copied.
trans-unit.target: Dataene i filen er ikke overført.

trans-unit.source: The `BFILE` data type should be used for referencing `LOB`s that are large in size, and therefore, not practical to store in the database.
trans-unit.target: Den `BFILE` datatypen som skal brukes for refererer til `LOB`s som er store størrelse, og derfor ikke praktisk for lagring i databasen.

trans-unit.source: There is client, server, and communication overhead for using a `BFILE` data type compared to the `LOB` data type.
trans-unit.target: Det er klienten, server og kommunikasjon overhead for bruk av en `BFILE` sammenlignet med datatypen i `LOB` datatype.

trans-unit.source: It is more efficient to access a `BFILE` if you only need to obtain a small amount of data.
trans-unit.target: Det er mer effektivt å få tilgang til en `BFILE` Hvis du trenger bare å få lite data.

trans-unit.source: It is more efficient to access database-resident `LOB`s if you need to obtain the entire object.
trans-unit.target: Det er mer effektivt Access database faste `LOB`s Hvis du vil hente hele objektet.

trans-unit.source: Each non-NULL OracleBFile object is associated with two entities that define the location of the underlying physical file: - An Oracle DIRECTORY object, which is a database alias for a directory in the file system, and - The file name of the underlying physical file, which is located in the directory associated with the DIRECTORY object.
trans-unit.target: Hver ikke - NULL OracleBFile-objektet er knyttet til to enheter som definerer plasseringen for den underliggende fysiske fil:-en Oracle-MAPPEN objektet, som er et databasealias for en mappe i filsystemet og -filnavnet for underliggende fysisk fil som finnes i katalogen som er knyttet til KATALOGEN-objektet.

trans-unit.source: After a `BFILE` is created, you can retrieve its locator in the form of an OracleBFile object using the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteReader%2A> or <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteScalar%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Etter en `BFILE` er opprettet, kan du hente locator i form av et OracleBFile objektet ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>eller <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteScalar%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteScalar%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleCommand.ExecuteReader%2A>

trans-unit.source: To obtain an OracleBFile object, call the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader.GetOracleBFile%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: For å få et OracleBFile-objekt, kan du kalle den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader.GetOracleBFile%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader.GetOracleBFile%2A>

trans-unit.source: The physical file that an OracleBFile object is associated with does not need to exist until you attempt to access it.
trans-unit.target: Den fysiske filen som et OracleBFile objekt er tilknyttet må ikke finnes før du prøver å få tilgang til den.

trans-unit.source: An application can bind an OracleBFile to a nonexistent file, create the physical file in the expected location, and then call <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.Read%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Et program kan binde en OracleBFile til en ikke-eksisterende fil opprette den fysiske filen på forventet plassering og kall deretter <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.Read%2A>.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.Read%2A>

trans-unit.source: Any attempt to access a closed OracleBFile using the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.Read%2A> or <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.Seek%2A> methods reopens an OracleBFile stream automatically.
trans-unit.target: Noen prøver å få tilgang til en lukket OracleBFile ved hjelp av <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.Read%2A>eller <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.Seek%2A>metoder åpnes på nytt en OracleBFile dataflyten automatisk.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.Seek%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.Read%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following C# example demonstrates how you can create a `BFILE` in an Oracle table, and then retrieve it in the form of an OracleBFile object.
trans-unit.target: C# eksemplet nedenfor viser hvordan du kan opprette en `BFILE` i en Oracle tabellen, og Hent den i form av et OracleBFile-objekt.

trans-unit.source: The example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader> object and the OracleBFile<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.Seek%2A> and <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.Read%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Eksemplet viser bruk av den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader>objektet og OracleBFile<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.Seek%2A> og <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.Read%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.Read%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.Seek%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader>

trans-unit.source: [!code-cs[DataWorks OracleClient.BFile#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.data.oracleclie_3_1.cs)] For more information about creating and using an Oracle `BFILE`, see the appropriate topic in your Oracle documentation.
trans-unit.target: [!code-cs[DataWorks OracleClient.BFile#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.data.oracleclie_3_1.cs) ] For mer informasjon om å opprette og bruke en Oracle `BFILE`, kan du se det relevante emnet i dokumentasjonen for Oracle.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The `BeginWrite`, `EndWrite`, and `WriteByte` methods, which are inherited from the `System.IO.Stream` class, are not supported because the `BFILE` data type is read-only.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Den `BeginWrite`, `EndWrite`, og `WriteByte` metoder, som er arvet fra den `System.IO.Stream` klasse, støttes ikke fordi den `BFILE` datatypen er skrivebeskyttet.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref uid="langword_csharp_BFILE" name="BFILE" href=""></xref> stream can be read.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den <xref uid="langword_csharp_BFILE" name="BFILE" href=""> </xref> kan kopiere dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if a <xref uid="langword_csharp_BFILE" name="BFILE" href=""></xref> is closed or disposed; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>Hvis en <xref uid="langword_csharp_BFILE" name="BFILE" href=""> </xref> er lukket eller fjernet; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> for <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.Null"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> for <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.Null"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether forward-seek and backward-seek operations can be performed.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om søker etter fremover og bakover-søk kan utføres.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if a <xref uid="langword_csharp_BFILE" name="BFILE" href=""></xref> is closed or disposed; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>Hvis en <xref uid="langword_csharp_BFILE" name="BFILE" href=""> </xref> er lukket eller fjernet; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> for <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.Null"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> for <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.Null"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the object supports writing.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om objektet støtter skriving.

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> because the Oracle <xref uid="langword_csharp_BFILE" name="BFILE" href=""></xref> data type is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer alltid <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> fordi Oracle <xref uid="langword_csharp_BFILE" name="BFILE" href=""> </xref> datatypen er skrivebeskyttet.

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of this <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile"></xref> object associated with the same physical file as the original.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en kopi av denne <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile"> </xref> objektet som er knyttet til samme fysisk fil som opprinnelig.

trans-unit.source: The properties of the new <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile> object initially have the same values as those of the original object.
trans-unit.target: Egenskaper for den nye <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile>objektet opprinnelig er de samme som i det opprinnelige objektet.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile>

trans-unit.source: However, after the Clone is complete, each <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile> object is independent from the other.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid etter klone er fullført, hver <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile>objektet er uavhengig av hverandre.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile>

trans-unit.source: For example, changing the value of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.Position%2A> property on the original <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile> does not change the value of <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.Position%2A> on the copy.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel endre verdien for den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.Position%2A>egenskap i opprinnelige <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile>ikke endre verdien for <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.Position%2A>på kopien.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.Position%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.Position%2A>

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile"></xref> object associated with the same physical file as the original <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleBFile" name="OracleBFile" href=""></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: En ny <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile"> </xref> objektet som er knyttet til samme fysisk fil som opprinnelig <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleBFile" name="OracleBFile" href=""> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection"></xref> used by this instance of the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection"> </xref> brukes i denne forekomsten av den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The connection to a data source.
trans-unit.target: Tilkobling til en datakilde.

trans-unit.source: The default is a null value.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en nullverdi.

trans-unit.source: Copies the entire contents of this <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile"></xref> to the beginning of a destination <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Kopierer hele innholdet i dette <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile"> </xref> til starten av et mål <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The underlying data types of the source <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile> and the destination <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob> must be compatible.
trans-unit.target: Datatypene underliggende for datakilden <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile>, og målet <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob>må være kompatibel.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile>

trans-unit.source: For example, you cannot copy binary data to a destination <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob> that has a character data type.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel kopiere binære data til et mål <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob>som har datatypen tegn.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob>

trans-unit.source: You must have write access to the destination <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob> for the CopyTo operation to execute correctly.
trans-unit.target: Du må ha skrivetilgang til målet <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob>for CopyTo operasjonen til å kjøre på riktig måte.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob>

trans-unit.source: The destination <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"></xref>
trans-unit.target: Målet<xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"></xref>

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes copied.
trans-unit.target: Antall byte kopieres.

trans-unit.source: The destination <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleLob" name="OracleLob" href=""></xref> is a null object reference.
trans-unit.target: Målet <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleLob" name="OracleLob" href=""> </xref> er en null-objekt-referanse.

trans-unit.source: The destination is a null <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleLob" name="OracleLob" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Målet er en null <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleLob" name="OracleLob" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: -or- The connection with which this <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleBFile" name="OracleBFile" href=""></xref> is associated is closed.
trans-unit.target: - eller - tilkoblingen som denne <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleBFile" name="OracleBFile" href=""> </xref> er knyttet til er lukket.

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleBFile" name="OracleBFile" href=""></xref> object is closed or disposed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleBFile" name="OracleBFile" href=""> </xref> objektet er lukket eller fjernet.

trans-unit.source: Copies the entire contents of this <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile"></xref> to a destination <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"></xref> at the specified offset.
trans-unit.target: Kopierer hele innholdet i dette <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile"> </xref> til et mål <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"> </xref> fra den angitte forskyvningen.

trans-unit.source: The underlying data types of the source <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile> and the destination <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob> must be compatible.
trans-unit.target: Datatypene underliggende for datakilden <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile>, og målet <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob>må være kompatibel.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile>

trans-unit.source: For example, you cannot copy binary data to a destination <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob> that has a character data type.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel kopiere binære data til et mål <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob>som har datatypen tegn.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob>

trans-unit.source: You must have write access to the destination <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob> for the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.CopyTo%2A> operation to execute correctly.
trans-unit.target: Du må ha skrivetilgang til målet <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob>for den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.CopyTo%2A>operasjonen til å kjøre på riktig måte.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.CopyTo%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob>

trans-unit.source: The destination <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Målet <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The offset to which to copy.
trans-unit.target: Forskyvningen som skal kopieres.

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes copied.
trans-unit.target: Antall byte kopieres.

trans-unit.source: The destination <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleLob" name="OracleLob" href=""></xref> is a null object reference.
trans-unit.target: Målet <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleLob" name="OracleLob" href=""> </xref> er en null-objekt-referanse.

trans-unit.source: The destination is a null <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleLob" name="OracleLob" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Målet er en null <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleLob" name="OracleLob" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: -or- The connection with which this <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleBFile" name="OracleBFile" href=""></xref> is associated is closed.
trans-unit.target: - eller - tilkoblingen som denne <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleBFile" name="OracleBFile" href=""> </xref> er knyttet til er lukket.

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleBFile" name="OracleBFile" href=""></xref> object is closed or disposed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleBFile" name="OracleBFile" href=""> </xref> objektet er lukket eller fjernet.

trans-unit.source: Copies from this <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile"></xref> to a destination <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"></xref> with the specified amount of data, the source offset, and the destination offset.
trans-unit.target: Kopier fra dette <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile"> </xref> til et mål <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"> </xref> med det angitte antall data, forskyvningen for kilden og målet forskyvningen.

trans-unit.source: The underlying data types of the source <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile> and the destination <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob> must be compatible.
trans-unit.target: Datatypene underliggende for datakilden <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile>, og målet <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob>må være kompatibel.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile>

trans-unit.source: For example, you cannot copy binary data to a destination <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob> that has a character data type.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel kopiere binære data til et mål <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob>som har datatypen tegn.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob>

trans-unit.source: You must have write access to the destination <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob> for the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.CopyTo%2A> operation to execute correctly.
trans-unit.target: Du må ha skrivetilgang til målet <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob>for den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.CopyTo%2A>operasjonen til å kjøre på riktig måte.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.CopyTo%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob>

trans-unit.source: The offset from which to copy.
trans-unit.target: Forskyvningen som skal kopieres.

trans-unit.source: The destination <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Målet <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleLob"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The offset to which to copy.
trans-unit.target: Forskyvningen som skal kopieres.

trans-unit.source: The quantity of data, in bytes, to copy.
trans-unit.target: Antallet data, i byte for å kopiere.

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes copied.
trans-unit.target: Antall byte kopieres.

trans-unit.source: The value of the amount parameter is less than zero or greater than 4 gigabytes.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for parameteren beløpet er mindre enn null eller større enn 4 GB.

trans-unit.source: The destination <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleLob" name="OracleLob" href=""></xref> is a null object reference.
trans-unit.target: Målet <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleLob" name="OracleLob" href=""> </xref> er en null-objekt-referanse.

trans-unit.source: The destination is a null <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleLob" name="OracleLob" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Målet er en null <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleLob" name="OracleLob" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: -or- The connection with which this <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleBFile" name="OracleBFile" href=""></xref> is associated is closed.
trans-unit.target: - eller - tilkoblingen som denne <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleBFile" name="OracleBFile" href=""> </xref> er knyttet til er lukket.

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleBFile" name="OracleBFile" href=""></xref> object is closed or disposed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleBFile" name="OracleBFile" href=""> </xref> objektet er lukket eller fjernet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the DIRECTORY object, with which an <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile"></xref> object is associated.
trans-unit.target: Henter navnet på MAPPEN-objektet som en <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile"> </xref> objektet som er knyttet til.

trans-unit.source: Each non-NULL <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile> object is associated with two entities that define the location of underlying physical file: - An Oracle DIRECTORY object, which is a database alias for a directory in the file system, and - The file name of the underlying physical file, which is located in the directory associated with the DIRECTORY object.
trans-unit.target: Hver bruker som ikke er NULL <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile>objektet er knyttet til to enheter som definerer plasseringen av underliggende fysisk fil:-en Oracle-MAPPEN objektet, som er et databasealias for en mappe i filsystemet og -filnavnet for underliggende fysisk fil som finnes i katalogen som er knyttet til KATALOGEN-objektet.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile>

trans-unit.source: The DirectoryName property returns the name of the DIRECTORY object from the Oracle database.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen DirectoryName returnerer navnet på MAPPEN-objektet fra Oracle-databasen.

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating and using an Oracle `BFILE`, see the appropriate topic in your Oracle documentation.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om å opprette og bruke en Oracle `BFILE`, kan du se det relevante emnet i dokumentasjonen for Oracle.

trans-unit.source: The name of the DIRECTORY object.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på MAPPEN-objektet.

trans-unit.source: Attempted to call <xref uid="langword_csharp_DirectoryName" name="DirectoryName" href=""></xref> on a closed or disposed <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleBFile" name="OracleBFile" href=""></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Forsøkte å kalle <xref uid="langword_csharp_DirectoryName" name="DirectoryName" href=""> </xref> i en lukket eller fjernet <xref uid="langword_csharp_OracleBFile" name="OracleBFile" href=""> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a physical file containing <xref uid="langword_csharp_BFILE" name="BFILE" href=""></xref> data exists in the operating system.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om en fysisk fil som inneholder <xref uid="langword_csharp_BFILE" name="BFILE" href=""> </xref> finnes data i operativsystemet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a physical file containing <xref uid="langword_csharp_BFILE" name="BFILE" href=""></xref> data exists; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis en fysisk fil som inneholder <xref uid="langword_csharp_BFILE" name="BFILE" href=""> </xref> data finnes; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile"></xref> object is closed or disposed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile"> </xref> objektet er lukket eller fjernet.

trans-unit.source: The connection with which a <xref uid="langword_csharp_BFILE" name="BFILE" href=""></xref> is associated is closed.
trans-unit.target: Tilkoblingen som en <xref uid="langword_csharp_BFILE" name="BFILE" href=""> </xref> er knyttet til er lukket.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_BFILE" name="BFILE" href=""></xref> without the path.
trans-unit.target: Henter navnet på den <xref uid="langword_csharp_BFILE" name="BFILE" href=""> </xref> uten banen.

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.Null>, an empty string is returned.
trans-unit.target: For <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.Null>, returneres en tom streng.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.Null>

trans-unit.source: The name of the BFILE.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på BFILINFORMASJON.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile"></xref> object is closed or disposed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile"> </xref> objektet er lukket eller fjernet.

trans-unit.source: Not currently supported.
trans-unit.target: Støttes ikke for øyeblikket.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile"></xref> is a <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.Null"></xref> stream.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile"> </xref> er en <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.Null"> </xref> dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile"></xref> is a <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.Null"></xref> stream; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>if the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile"></xref> is a <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.Null"></xref> stream; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that returns the length in bytes of the physical file with which the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile"></xref> object is associated.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som returnerer lengde i byte for den fysiske filen som den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile"> </xref> objektet som er knyttet til.

trans-unit.source: A long value representing the length of the physical file in bytes.
trans-unit.target: En lang verdi som representerer lengden på den fysiske filen i byte.

trans-unit.source: Methods were called after the stream was closed or disposed.
trans-unit.target: Metoder ble kalt når dataflyten er lukket eller fjernet.

trans-unit.source: Represents a null <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile"></xref> object that is not bound to a physical file.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en null <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile"> </xref> objekt som ikke er bundet til en fysisk fil.

trans-unit.source: Null can be useful when you want to perform a comparison operation on an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile> to determine nullability.
trans-unit.target: Null kan være nyttig når du vil utføre en Sammenligningsoperasjon på en <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile>til å bestemme nullstillbarhet.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile>

trans-unit.source: Any attempt to perform a read operation on a Null object succeeds, but does not return any data.
trans-unit.target: Forsøk på å utføre en leseoperasjon på et Null-objekt er vellykket, men returnerer ikke data.

trans-unit.source: Any attempt to perform a write operation on a Null object generates an exception.
trans-unit.target: Forsøk på å utføre en skriveoperasjon på et Null-objekt genererer et unntak.

trans-unit.source: Selecting a `BFILE` column that contains a null value returns Null.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du velger en `BFILE` kolonne som inneholder en nullverdi returnerer Null.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current read position in the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile"></xref> stream.
trans-unit.target: Henter gjeldende lese plassering i den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile"> </xref> dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: Seeking to any location beyond the length of the stream is not supported.
trans-unit.target: Støtter ikke søking hvor som helst utover meldingens lengde dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: The `Position` property does not keep track of the number of bytes from the stream that have been consumed, skipped, or both.
trans-unit.target: Den `Position` egenskapen ikke holde oversikt over antall byte fra dataflyt som har blitt brukt, hoppet over, eller begge deler.

trans-unit.source: The current position within the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile"></xref> stream.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende plassering i den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile"> </xref> dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: Attempted to set a position with a negative value or greater than the length of the stream.
trans-unit.target: Forsøk på å angi en plassering med negativ eller større enn lengden på dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: Methods were called after the stream was closed or disposed.
trans-unit.target: Metoder ble kalt når dataflyten er lukket eller fjernet.

trans-unit.source: Reads a sequence of bytes from the current <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile"></xref> stream and advances the position within the stream by the number of bytes read.
trans-unit.target: Leser en sekvens med byte fra gjeldende <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile"> </xref> strøm- og forskudd posisjonen i dataflyten ved antall byte lest.

trans-unit.source: The Read method read a maximum of `count` bytes from the current stream and store them in `buffer` beginning at `offset`.
trans-unit.target: Metoden lese lese maksimalt `count` byte fra gjeldende flyten og lagre dem i `buffer` Start fra `offset`.

trans-unit.source: The current position within the stream is advanced by the number of bytes read; however, if an exception occurs, the current position within the stream remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende plassering i dataflyten Avansert på antall byte lest; Hvis det oppstår et unntak, forblir imidlertid gjeldende plassering i dataflyten uendret.

trans-unit.source: Read returns the number of bytes read.
trans-unit.target: Les returnerer antall byte som leses.

trans-unit.source: The return value is zero only if the position is currently at the end of the stream.
trans-unit.target: Den returnerte verdien er null hvis posisjonen er for øyeblikket på slutten av dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: Read will block until at least one byte of data can be read, in the event that no data is available.
trans-unit.target: Les blokkerer til minst én byte med data kan leses, at ingen data er tilgjengelig.

trans-unit.source: Read returns 0 only when the end of the file has been reached.
trans-unit.target: Skrivebeskyttet returnerer 0 når slutten på filen er nådd.

trans-unit.source: Read is free to return fewer bytes than requested even if the end of the stream has not been reached.
trans-unit.target: Les er fri til å returnere færre byte enn forespurte selv om slutten på dataflyten ikke er nådd.

trans-unit.source: Any attempt to access a closed <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile> using the Read or <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.Seek%2A> methods reopens an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile> stream automatically.
trans-unit.target: Noen prøver å få tilgang til en lukket <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile>med lesingen eller <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.Seek%2A>metoder kundetransaksjonene en <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile>flyten automatisk.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.Seek%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile>

trans-unit.source: The following C# example assumes this schema in an Oracle table: ``` (col1 number, col2 BFILE) ``` The example demonstrates using the Read and <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.Seek%2A> methods to access an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile> object.
trans-unit.target: Det følgende C# antas dette skjemaet i en Oracle-tabellen: ``` (col1 number, col2 BFILE) ``` eksemplet viser hvordan du bruker lesingen og <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.Seek%2A>metoder for å få tilgang til en <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile>objektet.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.Seek%2A>

trans-unit.source: An array of bytes.
trans-unit.target: En bytematrise.

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, the buffer contains the specified byte array with the values between `offset` and (`offset` + `count`) replaced by the bytes read from the current source.
trans-unit.target: Låse denne metoden, bufferen inneholder den angitte Bytematrisen med verdiene mellom `offset` og (`offset` + `count`) erstattet med byte lest fra den gjeldende kilden.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based byte offset in `buffer` at which to begin storing the data read from the current stream.
trans-unit.target: Forskyvning nullbasert byte i `buffer` vil begynne å lagre dataene lese fra gjeldende dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of bytes to be read from the current stream.
trans-unit.target: Maksimalt antall byte som leses fra den gjeldende dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: The total number of bytes read into the buffer.
trans-unit.target: Totalt antall byte som leses, til bufferen.

trans-unit.source: This may be less than the number of bytes requested if that many bytes are not currently available, or zero if the end of the file has been reached.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan være mindre enn antall byte som ble forespurt hvis mange byte er ikke tilgjengelig for øyeblikket, eller null hvis slutten på filen er nådd.

trans-unit.source: The sum of offset and count is larger than the buffer length.
trans-unit.target: Summen av offset og count er større enn bufferlengden.

trans-unit.source: buffer is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: bufferer en nullreferanse ( i Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: offset or count is negative.
trans-unit.target: offseteller count er negativt.

trans-unit.source: The connection with which a <xref uid="langword_csharp_BFILE" name="BFILE" href=""></xref> is associated is closed.
trans-unit.target: Tilkoblingen som en <xref uid="langword_csharp_BFILE" name="BFILE" href=""> </xref> er knyttet til er lukket.

trans-unit.source: An I/O error occurred.
trans-unit.target: Det oppstod en i/u-feil.

trans-unit.source: Methods were called after the stream was closed or disposed.
trans-unit.target: Metoder ble kalt når dataflyten er lukket eller fjernet.

trans-unit.source: Sets the position on the current <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile"></xref> stream.
trans-unit.target: Angir posisjonen i gjeldende <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile"> </xref> dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: If `offset` is negative, the new position is required to precede the position specified by `origin` by the number of bytes specified by `offset`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `offset` er negativ, den nye posisjonen kreves for å komme foran plasseringen angitt av `origin` av antall byte som er angitt av `offset`.

trans-unit.source: If `offset` is zero, the new position is required to be the position specified by `origin`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `offset` er null, den nye posisjonen kreves for å være plasseringen angitt av `origin`.

trans-unit.source: If `offset` is positive, the new position is required to follow the position specified by `origin` by the number of bytes specified by `offset`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `offset` er positivt, den nye posisjonen kreves for å følge plasseringen angitt av `origin` av antall byte som er angitt av `offset`.

trans-unit.source: Seeking to any location beyond the length of the stream is not supported.
trans-unit.target: Støtter ikke søking hvor som helst utover meldingens lengde dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: Any attempt to access a closed <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile> using the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.Read%2A> or Seek methods reopens an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile> stream automatically.
trans-unit.target: Noen prøver å få tilgang til en lukket <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile>ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.Read%2A>eller prøve metoder kundetransaksjonene en <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile>flyten automatisk.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.Read%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile>

trans-unit.source: The following C# example assumes this schema in an Oracle table: ``` (col1 number, col2 BFILE) ``` The example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.Read%2A> and Seek methods to access an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile> object.
trans-unit.target: Det følgende C# antas dette skjemaet i en Oracle-tabellen: ``` (col1 number, col2 BFILE) ``` eksemplet viser hvordan du bruker den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.Read%2A>og søke etter metoder for å få tilgang til en <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile>objektet.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.Read%2A>

trans-unit.source: A byte offset relative to origin.
trans-unit.target: Forskyvning i forhold til kommer fra en byte.

trans-unit.source: If `offset` is negative, the new position will precede the position specified by `origin` by the number of bytes specified by `offset`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `offset` er negativ, den nye posisjonen kommer før plasseringen angitt av `origin` av antall byte som er angitt av `offset`.

trans-unit.source: If `offset` is zero, the new position will be the position specified by `origin`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `offset` er null, blir den nye posisjonen plasseringen angitt av `origin`.

trans-unit.source: If `offset` is positive, the new position will follow the position specified by `origin` by the number of bytes specified by `offset`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `offset` er positivt, den nye plasseringen vil følge plasseringen angitt av `origin` av antall byte som er angitt av `offset`.

trans-unit.source: A value of type <xref uid="langword_csharp_System.IO.SeekOrigin" name="System.IO.SeekOrigin" href=""></xref> indicating the reference point used to obtain the new position.
trans-unit.target: En verdi av typen <xref uid="langword_csharp_System.IO.SeekOrigin" name="System.IO.SeekOrigin" href=""> </xref> angir referanse brukes til å få ny posisjon.

trans-unit.source: The new position within the current stream.
trans-unit.target: Den nye posisjonen i gjeldende dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: Attempted to set a position with a negative value or greater than the length of the stream.
trans-unit.target: Forsøk på å angi en plassering med negativ eller større enn lengden på dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: Methods were called after the stream was closed or disposed.
trans-unit.target: Metoder ble kalt når dataflyten er lukket eller fjernet.

trans-unit.source: Binds the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile"></xref> object to a different file in the operating system.
trans-unit.target: Binding av <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile"> </xref> -objekt til en annen fil i operativsystemet.

trans-unit.source: The SetFileName operation must be within a transaction to succeed.
trans-unit.target: Operasjonen SetFileName må være innenfor en transaksjon skal lykkes.

trans-unit.source: Simply calling SetFileName on a `BFILE` associates the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile> object with a different file, but does not update the Oracle table.
trans-unit.target: Kaller ganske enkelt SetFileName på en `BFILE` knytter det <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile>objekt med en annen fil, men ikke oppdatere Oracle-tabellen.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile>

trans-unit.source: To update the Oracle table after calling SetFileName, you must call the `Update` method of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter> and then commit the transaction.
trans-unit.target: For å oppdatere Oracle-tabell etter kaller SetFileName, må du kalle den `Update` -metoden for den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>og utføre transaksjonen.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: Once you retrieve the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.DirectoryName%2A> or <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.FileName%2A> property, they are cached in the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile> object and are unaffected by any cloned <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile> objects' calls to SetFileName, or by any changes to the `BFILE` in the database.
trans-unit.target: Når du hente det <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.DirectoryName%2A>eller <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.FileName%2A>egenskapen de bufret i den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile>objekt og påvirkes av en klone <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile>objektenes kall til SetFileName, eller ved endringer for det `BFILE` i databasen.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.FileName%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.DirectoryName%2A>

trans-unit.source: In other words, they might not represent the actual values of the `BFILE` object in the server.
trans-unit.target: Med andre ord, kan de ikke representerer de faktiske verdiene i den `BFILE` objektet på serveren.

trans-unit.source: Furthermore, retrieving either property (<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.DirectoryName%2A> or <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.FileName%2A>) causes both property values to be retrieved from the server and cached in the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile> object.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg henting av en av egenskapene (<xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.DirectoryName%2A> eller <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.FileName%2A>) fører til at begge verdier hentet fra serveren og bufret i den <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile>objektet.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.FileName%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.DirectoryName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following C# example assumes this schema in an Oracle table: ``` (col1 number, col2 BFILE) ``` The example demonstrates using the SetFileName, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.Read%2A> and <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.Seek%2A> methods to access an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile> object.
trans-unit.target: Det følgende C# antas dette skjemaet i en Oracle-tabellen: ``` (col1 number, col2 BFILE) ``` eksemplet viser hvordan du bruker SetFileName <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.Read%2A>og <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.Seek%2A>metoder for å få tilgang til en <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile>objektet.</xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.Seek%2A> </xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile.Read%2A>

trans-unit.source: The alias of the directory object that contains a physical file.
trans-unit.target: Aliaset til directory-objekt som inneholder en fysisk fil.

trans-unit.source: The name of the file in the operating system.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på filen i systemet.

trans-unit.source: The operation must be within a transaction.
trans-unit.target: Operasjonen må være innenfor en transaksjon.

trans-unit.source: Not currently supported.
trans-unit.target: Støttes ikke for øyeblikket.

trans-unit.source: Not currently supported.
trans-unit.target: Støttes ikke for øyeblikket.

trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when an invoked method is not supported, or when there is an attempt to read, seek, or write to a stream that does not support the invoked functionality.
trans-unit.target: Unntak forårsakes når en metoden ikke støttes, eller når det gjøres forsøk på å lese søker etter, eller skrive til en dataflyt som ikke støtter funksjonen som er startet.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref:System.Array> of type <xref:System.Byte> that contains the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile"></xref> data.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref:System.Array>av typen <xref:System.Byte>som inneholder den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile"> </xref> data.</xref:System.Byte> </xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The Value property reads the entire `BFILE` at one time.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen Value leser hele `BFILE` om gangen.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A benefit of using `BFILE`s is the ability to retrieve large amounts of data in chunks at the client.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Fordelene ved å bruke `BFILE`s er muligheten til å hente store mengder data i biter på klienten.

trans-unit.source: However, when you use Value, you obtain all the data for the BFILE column as one contiguous chunk, which can significantly increase application overhead.
trans-unit.target: Når du bruker verdi, kan du imidlertid få innstillingen for alle data for kolonnen BFILINFORMASJON som en sammenhengende gruppe, som kan øke programmet overhead betydelig.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Array> of type <xref:System.Byte> that contains the <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile"></xref> data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Array>av typen <xref:System.Byte>som inneholder den <xref href="System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBFile"> </xref> data.</xref:System.Byte> </xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: Not currently supported.
trans-unit.target: Støttes ikke for øyeblikket.

trans-unit.source: Not currently supported.
trans-unit.target: Støttes ikke for øyeblikket.

trans-unit.source: Not currently supported.
trans-unit.target: Støttes ikke for øyeblikket.

trans-unit.source: Not currently supported.
trans-unit.target: Støttes ikke for øyeblikket.

trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when an invoked method is not supported, or when there is an attempt to read, seek, or write to a stream that does not support the invoked functionality.
trans-unit.target: Unntak forårsakes når en metoden ikke støttes, eller når det gjøres forsøk på å lese søker etter, eller skrive til en dataflyt som ikke støtter funksjonen som er startet.
